title.narrative: Mobilising EMGs in various forums and support them emotionally through counselling

description.narrative: Mobilising EMGs in various forums and support them emotionally through counselling

title.narrative: # of families of exploited/abused children counselled

description.narrative: # of families of exploited/abused children counselled

comment.narrative: Counselling sessions were done over phone and virtually.;
The family members of the EMGs counselled first time during the quarter was 55 and the follow up was done with 511. Overall, reached 3341 out of 3000 planned;

description.narrative: Mobilising vulnerable children in clubs and sensitise them on the adverse effect of child marriages

title.narrative: # of vulnerable children participated in awareness raising sessions

description.narrative: # of vulnerable children participated in awareness raising sessions

comment.narrative: Awareness raising sessions on child marriages, abuses, protection from COVID were given during the quarter. As on the quarter the achievement is more than the plan.;
Due to Covid crisis, it was difficult to mobilise the children for mass meeting. The sessions were conducted virtually, one to one meet;
